sponsor: Pfizer's Upjohn has merged with Mylan to form Viatris Inc.
briefTitle: Study Of A Controlled Release Formulation Of Pregabalin In Fibromyalgia Patients
officialTitle: A Phase 3 Double-blind, Randomized, Placebo-controlled, Safety And Efficacy Study Of Once Daily Controlled Release Pregabalin In The Treatment Of Patients With Fibromyalgia (Protocol A0081245)
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of a controlled release formulation of pregabalin administered once daily as compared to placebo in the treatment of fibromyalgia. All patients will receive pregabalin; half of the patients will receive placebo at some point in the study.

primaryOutcome.measure: Double-Blind Phase: Time to Loss of Therapeutic Response (LTR)
